title: bhagavAn ramaNarai
sahitya:
bhagavAn ramaNaraip-pArttAlE pOdumE parama jnAnam varumE


anupallavi

  sukhamAna uLLa guhaiyil irundavan saha vicitramAna calanap-paDam kANbAn


caraNam 1    nAnAr engira Atma vicArattAl nAlu vEda sAram arindavan
tAnE tAnAgi tannil anaittumAi tazhaittAn azhaittAn pazhutta vivEki
    caraNam 2    eduvE uLLattirp-podu naTan purivadO eduvE ulaguyir enna virindadO
aduvE mahariSi aduvE mahAtmA arputam aduvE amarAtmA Om
